    • com.vdisk.net.exception中VDiskException的使用

      com.vdisk.net.exception中VDiskException的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  VDiskDialogError 
      class  VDiskDownloadFileExistException 
      class  VDiskFileNotFoundException 
      class  VDiskFileSizeException
      Thrown when trying to upload a file larger than the API can handle.
      class  VDiskIOException
      Encapsulates an IOExceptions when using the API, typically resulting from network-related issues.
      class  VDiskLocalStorageFullException
      Thrown when writing to local storage and there is no more room.
      class  VDiskParseException
      Indicates there was trouble parsing a response from VDisk.
      class  VDiskPartialFileException
      Used when only part of a file was transferred to/from VDisk when using the API.
      class  VDiskServerException
      Wraps any non-200 HTTP responses from an API call.
      class  VDiskSSLException
      Wraps any SSL-related exceptions thrown when using the API.
      class  VDiskUnlinkedException
      Thrown when the API can only be used when linked but it's not.
